a.span: Augusta Independent School District - Board of Education

div.div:
Superintendent's Message
The Augusta Independent School District is one of the few in Kentucky housing preschool through 12th-grade students in the same building. Our district takes pride in being able to reach every student daily because of the small learning environment and one-on-one relationships with faculty, staff, parents and community partners. The district boasts a safe and nurturing learning climate, ...
Read More
Lisa McCane

div.a: Children in Augusta have a New Option to Prepare for Kindergarten

div.span: Families in Kentucky now have a new option to prepare their children for kindergarten at home and at no cost beginning in August.

div.span: Augusta Independent School District’s insurance does not cover student injuries due to accidents at school or during school-sponsored activities such as a field trip or basketball game.
